DEAD_SHOT.Name: Deadshot
DEAD_SHOT.Description: Deadshot: {0} % chance to kill enemies with less than 30% HP

FURY_SHOT.Description: When attacking the same target, damage dealt will increase per hit. Max damage when monster received 100 bullets.

RICOCHET.Name: Ricochet
RICOCHET.Description: Fire {0} additional projectiles just after the previous but applies -10% base damage after bounce.

BULLET_TRAIL.Name: Bullet trail
BULLET_TRAIL.Description: Fire {0} additional projectile forward but reduce damage by 25% base damage of equipment

PIERCE.Name: Pierce
PIERCE.Description: Projectiles passes through enemies but deal -33% damage after each enemy

PUSH_BACK.Name: Push back
PUSH_BACK.Description: Projectiles push the units back after hit on them

AOE.Description: Projectiles will cause an area of effect after hit the enemies or explode

DIAGONAL.Name: Diagonal bullet

DEAL_EQUIP.Description: Deals {0}% equipment damage when being attacked by enemies
